markdownRemark.html:
Silly question, isn’t it? Maybe the answer automatically popped up in your head - I retire, when my government retirement age tells me to retire.

Though, the second deeper questions my sounds like “Can I retire earlier than governent allow me to?”

frontmatter.title: So when is actually the time to retire?
